ACCOUNT_TYPE_CHANGED.label: Account type changed
ACCOUNT_TYPE_CHANGED.description: Triggers when an account is assigned a new type.

ALLOWANCE_CONSUMED.label: Allowance was consumed
ALLOWANCE_CONSUMED.description: Triggers when an account’s allowance amount decreases, e.g. after a booking or purchase that consumes allowance.

DATE.label: Date
DATE.description: Triggers before, after, or on a date related to an account.

DOCUMENT_COMPLETE.label: Document complete
DOCUMENT_COMPLETE.description: Triggers when all required parties have signed a document and it is marked as signed.

DOCUMENT_SENT.label: Document sent
DOCUMENT_SENT.description: Triggers when a document is sent to a user for signing.

INVOICE_PAID.label: Invoice paid
INVOICE_PAID.description: Triggers when an invoice receives a payment and the balance becomes zero.

INVOICE_DUE.label: Invoice became due
INVOICE_DUE.description: Triggers when an invoice changes to due.

INVOICE_OVERDUE.label: Invoice became overdue
INVOICE_OVERDUE.description: Triggers when an invoice changes to overdue (controlled by your Invoice Policy in settings).

MANUAL.label: Manual enrollment
MANUAL.description: Can be manually triggered by an admin from Inbox or Account menu.

NEW_UNCONFIRMED_USER.label: New unconfirmed user
NEW_UNCONFIRMED_USER.description: Triggers 1 hour after a user is added but has not completed creating their account. E.g. unfinished app onboarding, added by Inquiry widget, etc.

NEW_ACTIVE_USER.label: New active user
NEW_ACTIVE_USER.description: Triggers when a user's status becomes active.

NEW_ASSIGNMENT.label: New assignment
NEW_ASSIGNMENT.description: Triggers when an admin sets up an assignment for a user.

NEW_BOOKING.label: New resource booking
NEW_BOOKING.description: Triggers when a booking is created by either a user or an admin.

NEW_CHECKIN.label: New check-in
NEW_CHECKIN.description: Triggers when a user is checked in to a location.

NEW_ISSUE.label: New issue raised
NEW_ISSUE.description: Triggers when a user reports an issue on their app. E.g. ‘Wi-Fi is too slow’.

NEW_PASS_SALE.label: New pass sale
NEW_PASS_SALE.description: Triggers when a pass is added to a user or team’s account.

NEW_PLAN.label: New plan added
NEW_PLAN.description: Triggers when a plan is added to a user or team’s account.

NEW_PRODUCT_SALE.label: New product sale
NEW_PRODUCT_SALE.description: Triggers when a user buys a product or an admin adds a sale to an invoice.

NEW_TOUR.label: New tour booking
NEW_TOUR.description: Triggers when a booking is created via the tour booking web widget.

ADD_ALLOWANCE.label: Add allowance
ADD_ALLOWANCE.description: Add allowance to a user or team

ADD_INVOICE_ITEM.label: Add invoice item
ADD_INVOICE_ITEM.description: Add a charge or credit to a user or team's next invoice

CHANGE_ACCOUNT_TYPE.label: Change account type
CHANGE_ACCOUNT_TYPE.description: Useful when the account type is used for conditions, e.g. resource availability

CHANGE_USER_STATUS.label: Change user status
CHANGE_USER_STATUS.description: Set a user’s status to active or inactive

CREATE_TASK.label: Create a task
CREATE_TASK.description: Create a task for any admin, containing a link to the trigger of the automation

SEND_EMAIL.label: Send an email
SEND_EMAIL.description: Send an email to a user, team, or an admin

SEND_MESSAGE.label: Send a message
SEND_MESSAGE.description: Send a message to a user, team, or an admin

SEND_DOC_TO_SIGN.label: Send a document for signing
SEND_DOC_TO_SIGN.description: Have documents digitally signed and stored in the Account panel

POST_TO_FEED.label: Post to feed
POST_TO_FEED.description: Create a new post on the community feed

ACCOUNT_PLAN_NAME.label: Plan name
ACCOUNT_PLAN_NAME.hint: The name of the plan that has been added to the account

ACCOUNT_PLAN_PRICE.label: Plan price
ACCOUNT_PLAN_PRICE.hint: The recurring cost of the plan

ACCOUNT_ACTIVE_PLAN_TEMPLATE_ID.label: Active plan
ACCOUNT_ACTIVE_PLAN_TEMPLATE_ID.hint: In-trial or active plans of the account

ACCOUNT_ACTIVE_PASS_PRODUCT_ID.label: Active pass
ACCOUNT_ACTIVE_PASS_PRODUCT_ID.hint: Accounts that have bought this pass and still have remaining allowance, including those with access to allowance through a team pass purchase

MACRO_ASSIGNMENT_DETAILS.label: Assignment details e.g. Resource name, start date, etc.

MACRO_BOOKING_DETAILS.label: Booking Details e.g. Resource, date, etc.

MACRO_INVOICE_DETAILS.label: Invoice details e.g. Invoice #, date, etc.

MACRO_NEW_PLAN_DETAILS.label: Plan details e.g. Plan start date, price, etc.

WALLET_ACCESS_TEMPLATE_ID.label: Allowance template
WALLET_ACCESS_TEMPLATE_ID.hint: The allowance template that is attached to the account
